addressFormat.description: Specifies the format of the address that is displayed on external-facing documents. You link an address format to a country/region code so that external-facing documents based on cards or documents with that country/region code use the specified address format.

displayName.description: Specifies the country/region's name. This name will appear on all sales documents for the country/region.

id.description: The unique ID of the country/region. Non-editable.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The last datetime the country/region was modified. Read-Only.
